turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Task 1: “To practice how to order coffee at the coffee.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, let's do that! I'll be the barista, and you can be the customer. Whenever you're ready, just let me know what you'd like to order, and we'll go from there.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, perfect. We can start now.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Awesome! Welcome to our café! What kind of coffee would you like to order today? Feel free to let me know any specifics, like size or any extra flavors.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you. To be honest, I don't usually drink coffee, so I don't know which... Do you have any recommendation? I don't like the strong flavors.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! If you prefer something milder, I’d recommend maybe a latte or a cappuccino, which have a nice balance of milk and espresso. Or we can do something like a mocha if you like a bit of chocolate. How does that sound?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Sounds good, but I don't know, what is the difference between latte and cappuccino?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Great question! So, a latte has more steamed milk and just a little bit of foam, making it creamier and smoother. A cappuccino, on the other hand, has equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and foam, so it’s a bit frothier and has a stronger coffee taste. Does that help?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, for me the latte sounds good, and do you have something to eat?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, we have a variety of pastries and snacks. We have croissants, muffins, and even some sandwiches. Is there something specific you’re in the mood for?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Maybe a sandwich. What kind of sandwich do you have?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Sure! We have a few options. There's a classic ham and cheese sandwich, a veggie sandwich with hummus and fresh veggies, and also a chicken pesto sandwich. Anything catching your eye?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Not really, I mean, do you have maybe a steak sandwich?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, we do have a steak sandwich! It comes with tender slices of steak, some sautéed onions, and a bit of cheese on a fresh baguette. How does that sound to you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Good, good. I would like the steak sandwich and the latte, but please, the steak sandwich could be medium.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect! So that's one medium steak sandwich and one latte. Would you like any specific milk for your latte, like almond or oat milk, or just regular dairy?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, same thing, today I would like almond milk.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it! One latte with almond milk and one medium steak sandwich. That sounds delicious! Is there anything else I can get for you today?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “How long will that take?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: It should only take a few minutes! We'll have your latte freshly made and the steak sandwich prepared just right. You can expect it in about five minutes or so. Sound good?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yeah, I would like to eat here, in that case.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, we'll get everything ready for you, and you can have a seat and relax. We'll bring it right over once it's done. If you need anything else in the meantime, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, but I don't know about the price.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No worries at all! The latte with almond milk is usually around four dollars, and the steak sandwich is about eight dollars. So, together, it’ll be roughly twelve dollars. If you have any discounts or anything specific in mind, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I am a student, I don't know if you have a scan for students.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, we do offer a student discount! You can get about 10% off your order. Just show me your student ID when you pick it up, and I'll apply that discount for you!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I appreciate your help, I hope you have a great day, thank you for everything.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! It was my pleasure. I hope you enjoy your meal, and have a fantastic day as well! If you need anything else, just let me know.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you!”
